clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in peripheral vascular disease and raynaud s disease

contraindications.disease: 10 mg and 40 mg was well tolerated during clinical trials with Raynaud s patients
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: At low doses OPC 28326 selectively vasodilates the femoral arterial bed due to its inhibitory action at alpha 2 adrenoceptors while having minimal action on systemic blood pressure heart rate and coronary carotid vertebral renal and mesenteric blood flows
